name: Global dark style - everything to DARK 2018 bg 1
description:
Same as "Global dark style - everything to DARK 2018" by testmode1 
https://userstyles.org/styles/158321/global-dark-style-everything-to-dark-2018
with original background image from "Global dark style - everything to DARK" by stormi 
https://userstyles.org/styles/31267/global-dark-style-changes-everything-to-dark
For testing purposes ...
additional_info:
Notes from latest update:

See CSS code comments for changelog ...

2020-01-13:
- Changed URL regexp
- Undo override border for "*item-selected*", "*item-over*" class elements

2019-12-25:
- Override gray background for "*item-selected*", "*item-over*" class elements

2019-05-08:
- Override gray background for "*pass*", "*block*" class elements in tables fixed

2019-05-06:
- Override gray background for "*label-success*", "*label-danger*" class elements
- Override gray color for "*text-success*", "*text-muted*", "*text-info*", "*text-warning*" class elements
- Override gray background for "*pass*", "*block*" class elements in tables

2019-05-02:
- Override white background for elements with "z-style", except "*image*"
- Changed background for "*container*" class elements, except "*image*"

2019-04-26:
- Changed color for "*link*" class elements

2019-03-18:
- Override white background for ".content-box-head" elements
- Changed background for "text" elements and "*legend*" classes

2019-03-17:
- Changed background for "*text*" class elements, except "*force-repaint-content*" and "*track*" classes

2019-03-05:
- Changed color for "*ColorNormal*" class elements ( which include "*u-textColorNormal*" )
- Changed color for "*ColorDarker*" and "*ColorDarkest*" class elements
- Changed color for "uiScale ui-captionStrong, ui-h1, ui-h2, ui-h3, ui-h4" class elements

2019-03-02:
- Changed background for "*text*" class elements, except "*force-repaint-content*" classes
- Changed color for "*u-textColorNormal*" class elements
- Changed normal and hover opacity for "img" elements
- Remove border attribute override for "textarea" elements
- Changed background for "*main*" class elements

...
